Reviews.Title: My VCR is better
Reviews.Author: j
Reviews.Content: The quality at it's highest setting is worse than my vcr quality of recording.the battery for the remote was dead.sometimes a function button will cause a different function when pressed.on screen display of time , date , hard drive usage and ch cannot be turned off.( no option for it )other remote controls will cause functions to happenI had to fix the power connector for the hard drive.user guide is poor in helping and info on it and/or about it.And I'm sure I will find more problems and dislikes as soon as i go network and internet with it.
